note.ab: Gädam. Monastic community has, reportedly, up to 50 monks. Below, at the foot of the mount, there is a small church at the place where ʾArägawi, reportedly "disappeared" (therefore called Mǝswarom). A small nunnery is located in the village nearby. Tabots (a large unidentified number): ʾArägawi, Mary, Täklä Haymanot, Matyas, and many others.
